solution:
Consider the polynomial
\begin{align*}
p(x) &= \frac{a^3 (x - b)(x - c)(x - d)(x - e)}{(a - b)(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} + \frac{b^3 (x - a)(x - c)(x - d)(x - e)}{(b - a)(b - c)(b - d)(b - e)} \\
&\quad + \frac{c^3 (x - a)(x - b)(x - d)(x - e)}{(c - a)(c - b)(c - d)(c - e)} + \frac{d^3 (x - a)(x - b)(x - c)(x - e)}{(d - a)(d - b)(d - c)(d - e)} \\
&\quad + \frac{e^3 (x - a)(x - b)(x - c)(x - d)}{(e - a)(e - b)(e - c)(e - d)}.
\end{align*}Note that $p(x)$ is a polynomial of degree at most 4.  Also, $p(a) = a^3,$ $p(b) = b^3,$ $p(c) = c^3,$ $p(d) = d^3,$ and $p(e) = e^3.$  Since the polynomial $p(x)$ and $x^3$ agree at five different values, by the Identity Theorem, they are the same polynomial.

The expression given in the problem is the coefficient of $x^4$ in $p(x),$ which is then $\boxed{0}.$
model_solution:
## Step 1: Apply Vieta's formulas to find the relationship between the roots of the polynomial.
Since $a,$ $b,$ $c,$ $d,$ and $e$ are the roots of the equation $x^5 + 7x^4 - 2 = 0,$ we have by Vieta's formulas that $a + b + c + d + e = -7,$ $ab + ac + ad + ae + bc + bd + be + cd + ce + de = 0,$ $abc + abd + abe + acd + ace + ade + bcd + bce + bde + cde = 0,$ $abcd + abe + acde + bcde = 2,$ and $abcde = -2.$
## Step 2: 
\begin{align*}
&\frac{a^3}{(a - b)(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} + \frac{b^3}{(b - a)(b - c)(b - d)(b - e)} \\
&\quad + \frac{c^3}{(c - a)(c - b)(c - d)(c - e)} + \frac{d^3}{(d - a)(d - b)(d - c)(d - e)} \\
&\quad + \frac{e^3}{(e - a)(e - b)(e - c)(e - d)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a^3}{(a - b)(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a^3 - b^3 + b^3}{(a - b)(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(a - b)(a^2 + ab + b^2
## Step 3
\begin{align*}
&\sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(a - b)(a^2 + ab + b^2)}{(a - b)(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a^2 + ab + b^2}{(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a^2 + ab + b^2}{(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} - \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{c^2 + ca + a^2}{(c - a)(c - d)(c - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a^2 + ab + b^2 - (c^2 + ca + a^2)}{(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(a^2 - c^2) + (ab - ca)}{(a - c)(a - d)(a -
## Step 4
\begin{align*}
&\sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(a^2 - c^2) + (ab - ca)}{(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(a + c)(a - c) + (a - c)(b)}{(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a - c}{(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1}{(a - d)(a - e)}.
\end{align*}
## Step 5
\begin{align*}
&\sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1}{(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1}{(d - a)(d - e)} - \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1}{(e - a)(e - d)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1 - ((e - a)(e - d) / ((d - a)(d - e)))}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1 - ((e - a)(e - d) / ((d - a)(d - e))) - (1 - ((a - d)(a - e) / ((e - a)(e - d))))}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(e - a)(e - d) - (a - d)(a -
## Step 6
\begin{align*}
&\sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(e - a)(e - d) - (a - d)(a - e)}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(e - a)(e - d) - (a - d)(a - e)}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(e^2 - ae - ed - e^2 + ad + ae + a^2 - a^2 - ad + ae + a^2 - ae - a^2 + ae + ed)}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(a^2 - a^2 + a^2 - a^2) + (a^2 - a^2 + a^2 - a^2) + (ae - ae + ae - ae) + (ad - ad + ad - ad) + (ed - ed + ed - ed) + (-ae - ae - ae - ae) + (-ad - ad -
\begin{align*}
&\sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(-2a + 2b) + (-2c + 2d) + (-2e + 2a) + (2a - 2b) + (2b - 2d) + (2d - 2e) + (-a + b - c + d - e)}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{-a + b - c + d - e}{(d - a)(d - e)}
\end{align*}
## Step 7
\begin{align*}
&\sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{-a + b - c + d - e}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{-a + b - c + d - e}{(d - a)(d - e)} - \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{-c + d - e - a + b}{(d - c)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{-a + b - c + d - e - (-c + d - e - a + b)}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{-a + b - c + d - e + c - d + e + a - b}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{0}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= 0 \end{align*}
## Step 8
\begin{align*}
0 = \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1}{(a - d)(a - e)} = \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a^3}{(a - b)(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)}.
\end{align*}
## Step 9
\begin{align*}
0 = \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a^3}{(a - b)(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)}.
\end{align*}
steps:
## Step 1: Apply Vieta's formulas to find the relationship between the roots of the polynomial.
Since $a,$ $b,$ $c,$ $d,$ and $e$ are the roots of the equation $x^5 + 7x^4 - 2 = 0,$ we have by Vieta's formulas that $a + b + c + d + e = -7,$ $ab + ac + ad + ae + bc + bd + be + cd + ce + de = 0,$ $abc + abd + abe + acd + ace + ade + bcd + bce + bde + cde = 0,$ $abcd + abe + acde + bcde = 2,$ and $abcde = -2.$

## Step 2: 
\begin{align*}
&\frac{a^3}{(a - b)(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} + \frac{b^3}{(b - a)(b - c)(b - d)(b - e)} \\
&\quad + \frac{c^3}{(c - a)(c - b)(c - d)(c - e)} + \frac{d^3}{(d - a)(d - b)(d - c)(d - e)} \\
&\quad + \frac{e^3}{(e - a)(e - b)(e - c)(e - d)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a^3}{(a - b)(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a^3 - b^3 + b^3}{(a - b)(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(a - b)(a^2 + ab + b^2

## Step 3
\begin{align*}
&\sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(a - b)(a^2 + ab + b^2)}{(a - b)(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a^2 + ab + b^2}{(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a^2 + ab + b^2}{(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} - \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{c^2 + ca + a^2}{(c - a)(c - d)(c - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a^2 + ab + b^2 - (c^2 + ca + a^2)}{(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(a^2 - c^2) + (ab - ca)}{(a - c)(a - d)(a -

## Step 4
\begin{align*}
&\sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(a^2 - c^2) + (ab - ca)}{(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(a + c)(a - c) + (a - c)(b)}{(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a - c}{(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1}{(a - d)(a - e)}.
\end{align*}

## Step 5
\begin{align*}
&\sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1}{(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1}{(d - a)(d - e)} - \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1}{(e - a)(e - d)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1 - ((e - a)(e - d) / ((d - a)(d - e)))}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1 - ((e - a)(e - d) / ((d - a)(d - e))) - (1 - ((a - d)(a - e) / ((e - a)(e - d))))}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(e - a)(e - d) - (a - d)(a -

## Step 6
\begin{align*}
&\sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(e - a)(e - d) - (a - d)(a - e)}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(e - a)(e - d) - (a - d)(a - e)}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(e^2 - ae - ed - e^2 + ad + ae + a^2 - a^2 - ad + ae + a^2 - ae - a^2 + ae + ed)}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(a^2 - a^2 + a^2 - a^2) + (a^2 - a^2 + a^2 - a^2) + (ae - ae + ae - ae) + (ad - ad + ad - ad) + (ed - ed + ed - ed) + (-ae - ae - ae - ae) + (-ad - ad -

## Step 7
\begin{align*}
&\sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{-a + b - c + d - e}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{-a + b - c + d - e}{(d - a)(d - e)} - \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{-c + d - e - a + b}{(d - c)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{-a + b - c + d - e - (-c + d - e - a + b)}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{-a + b - c + d - e + c - d + e + a - b}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{0}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= 0 \end{align*}
full_steps:
## Step 1: Apply Vieta's formulas to find the relationship between the roots of the polynomial.
Since $a,$ $b,$ $c,$ $d,$ and $e$ are the roots of the equation $x^5 + 7x^4 - 2 = 0,$ we have by Vieta's formulas that $a + b + c + d + e = -7,$ $ab + ac + ad + ae + bc + bd + be + cd + ce + de = 0,$ $abc + abd + abe + acd + ace + ade + bcd + bce + bde + cde = 0,$ $abcd + abe + acde + bcde = 2,$ and $abcde = -2.$

## Step 2: 
\begin{align*}
&\frac{a^3}{(a - b)(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} + \frac{b^3}{(b - a)(b - c)(b - d)(b - e)} \\
&\quad + \frac{c^3}{(c - a)(c - b)(c - d)(c - e)} + \frac{d^3}{(d - a)(d - b)(d - c)(d - e)} \\
&\quad + \frac{e^3}{(e - a)(e - b)(e - c)(e - d)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a^3}{(a - b)(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a^3 - b^3 + b^3}{(a - b)(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(a - b)(a^2 + ab + b^2

## Step 3
\begin{align*}
&\sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(a - b)(a^2 + ab + b^2)}{(a - b)(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a^2 + ab + b^2}{(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a^2 + ab + b^2}{(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} - \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{c^2 + ca + a^2}{(c - a)(c - d)(c - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a^2 + ab + b^2 - (c^2 + ca + a^2)}{(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(a^2 - c^2) + (ab - ca)}{(a - c)(a - d)(a -

## Step 4
\begin{align*}
&\sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(a^2 - c^2) + (ab - ca)}{(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(a + c)(a - c) + (a - c)(b)}{(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{a - c}{(a - c)(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1}{(a - d)(a - e)}.
\end{align*}

## Step 5
\begin{align*}
&\sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1}{(a - d)(a - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1}{(d - a)(d - e)} - \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1}{(e - a)(e - d)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1 - ((e - a)(e - d) / ((d - a)(d - e)))}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{1 - ((e - a)(e - d) / ((d - a)(d - e))) - (1 - ((a - d)(a - e) / ((e - a)(e - d))))}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(e - a)(e - d) - (a - d)(a -

## Step 6
\begin{align*}
&\sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(e - a)(e - d) - (a - d)(a - e)}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(e - a)(e - d) - (a - d)(a - e)}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(e^2 - ae - ed - e^2 + ad + ae + a^2 - a^2 - ad + ae + a^2 - ae - a^2 + ae + ed)}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{(a^2 - a^2 + a^2 - a^2) + (a^2 - a^2 + a^2 - a^2) + (ae - ae + ae - ae) + (ad - ad + ad - ad) + (ed - ed + ed - ed) + (-ae - ae - ae - ae) + (-ad - ad -

## Step 7
\begin{align*}
&\sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{-a + b - c + d - e}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{-a + b - c + d - e}{(d - a)(d - e)} - \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{-c + d - e - a + b}{(d - c)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{-a + b - c + d - e - (-c + d - e - a + b)}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{-a + b - c + d - e + c - d + e + a - b}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= \sum_{\text{sym}} \frac{0}{(d - a)(d - e)} \\
&= 0 \end{align*}
